description:
Surf the web without tracking with a VPN, shield your devices with Antivirus, & guard your identity with an all-in-one app.


What's new:

* We've added web content blocker — a new feature that lets you block specific website categories and manage content access across all family devices;
* You asked, we listened — the Maximize button is back on Windows!
* As always, we fixed minor bugs for steadier connections and a smoother experience.
